official_title: Expressing support for the goals and ideals of National Patient Safety Awareness Week.

summary.text: Expresses support for the goals and ideals of National Patient Safety Awareness Week. Encourages private sector efforts to improve patient safety and recognizes the need for public sector action to complement such efforts. Reaffirms the nation's commitment to promoting patient safety through education programs, supporting research, and expanding access to safe medical treatment.

titles.title: Expressing support for the goals and ideals of National Patient Safety Awareness Week.
